title: Reunión de Estrategia Q1 - Parte 1
content: Carlos: Buenos días a todos. Hoy vamos a revisar nuestra estrategia para el primer trimestre en el mercado ibérico. María: Gracias Carlos. He preparado un análisis detallado de las oportunidades en fintech. Juan: Perfecto. ¿Podemos empezar con el análisis de competencia? María: Claro. En España, vemos tres competidores principales...

title: Reunión de Estrategia Q1 - Parte 2
content: Juan: Continuando con el análisis de regulación en Portugal... Carlos: Sí, es importante destacar que el Banco de Portugal ha actualizado sus directrices. María: Esto representa una oportunidad excelente para nuestros servicios de compliance. Juan: Exactamente. Propongo que desarrollemos una solución específica...

title: Análisis de Mercado - Portugal
content: Ana: Bom dia. Vamos discutir as oportunidades no mercado português. Carlos: Gracias Ana. Tu experiencia en el mercado portugués es invaluable. Pedro: He identificado tres sectores clave donde podemos expandirnos. Ana: Excelente. El sector bancario portugués está muy receptivo a nuevas tecnologías...

title: Product Roadmap Review - Session 1
content: Sarah: Good afternoon everyone. Today we're reviewing our product roadmap for the retail technology suite. Michael: Thanks Sarah. I've prepared the technical feasibility analysis. Emily: Great. Let's start with the customer analytics module. Sarah: That's our priority item. We need to deliver this by Q2. Michael: I agree. The architecture is ready, and we can begin development next week...

title: Product Roadmap Review - Session 2
content: Emily: Moving on to the inventory management features... Michael: The integration with existing POS systems is critical here. Sarah: Absolutely. We've received feedback from three major retailers about this. Emily: What are their main concerns? Michael: Performance at scale and real-time synchronization. Sarah: We'll need to prioritize the performance optimization sprint...

title: Customer Feedback Session
content: David: Thank you all for joining today's customer feedback session. Sarah: We have some excellent insights from our beta customers. Lisa: I've compiled the survey results and interview transcripts. David: Perfect. Let's start with the most common feedback themes. Lisa: The top request is definitely better mobile experience. Sarah: That aligns with our roadmap. We're prioritizing mobile in Q2...

title: Sprint Planning
content: Alex: Good morning team. Let's plan our next sprint. Jennifer: I've reviewed the backlog and prioritized items. Tom: Great. What are the high-priority features? Alex: We need to focus on the analytics dashboard improvements. Jennifer: Agreed. And we should include the export functionality. Tom: That's been requested by multiple clients...
